code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{ThemeContext}from'./ThemeContext';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ThemeSwitcher(){const{darkMode,setDarkMode}=useContext(ThemeContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{background:darkMode?'#333':'#fff',color:darkMode?'#fff':'#000',padding:'16px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Motyw: ",darkMode?'Ciemny':'Jasny']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setDarkMode(!darkMode),children:"Prze\u0142\u0105cz motyw"})]});}export default ThemeSwitcher;
